changelog.description: Moved "Go to message" from plugin sub item to Action bar menu item
Fixed an issue where channel summaries mistakenly used the user name instead of the channel name
Made message count dynamic in AI Summarize: now shows unread message count by default instead of hardcoded 200
Removed 500 message limit from AI Summarize feature
Added "Export All Plugins" feature to backup all installed plugins into a single .plugins file
Added duration selection when banning/restricting users after deleting their messages, inspired from OctoGram
Added new select all media button in profile ~ General

changelog_text:
**What's New in v1.7.6-Beta:**

• Moved "Go to message" from plugin sub item to Action bar menu item
• Fixed an issue where channel summaries mistakenly used the user name instead of the channel name
• Made message count dynamic in AI Summarize: now shows unread message count by default instead of hardcoded 200
• Removed 500 message limit from AI Summarize feature
• Added "Export All Plugins" feature to backup all installed plugins into a single .plugins file
• Added duration selection when banning/restricting users after deleting their messages, inspired from OctoGram
• Added new select all media button in profile ~ General
